name: Pitch Meeting
description: One random other card you play this turn will be echoed at +50% effectiveness two turns from now.

hooks.OnPlay: if (Card != null && !State.ContainsKey("pitched")) { State["pitched"] = true; State["pitchedCard"] = Card; AddStatus(Player, new Status { Name = "Pitched Card", Duration = 2, Hooks = new Dictionary<string, string> { { "OnBuffExpire", "var pitched = State[\"pitchedCard\"]; Battle.EchoCard = pitched; Battle.EchoEffectiveness = 1.50; Log(\"The pitch is greenlit! \" + pitched.Name + \" echoes at 150%!\");" } } }); Log("Pitched " + Card.Name + " for future echo!"); }
